snippet: In the first weekend of “Age of Ultron,” target audiences made choices between the new movie and major sporting events.
abstract: Movie sequel The Avengers: Age of Ultron takes in $187.7 million in its opening weekend, lower total than expected by box office analysts, due to unusually strong competition from televised major sporting events.
lead_paragraph: In the first weekend of “Age of Ultron,” target audiences made choices between the new movie and major sporting events.
